q1: Do you think the video assistant referee is a good idea?
a1: Yes, referees on the field are human too, they make mistakes. It helps to have another look at a situation if need be.
q3: Will using video assistant referees slow the game down?
a3: no, I don't think it will slow the game down.
q4: Isnt it better to have the human error factor in the game?
a4: There is too much technology.  They will always use playbacks now.
q5: Do you think that VAR will still be used in the future ?
a5: Yes, video assistance referee allows you to get a better look at the field and players.
